materialRisks.title: Governance AI Risk
materialRisks.whyItMatters: Lack of AI governance increases regulatory, legal, and reputational exposure.

materialRisks.title: Monitoring AI Risk
materialRisks.whyItMatters: Insufficient model monitoring increases the likelihood of undetected failures and bias.

materialRisks.title: Business Continuity AI Risk
materialRisks.whyItMatters: AI system outages may disrupt critical operations and recovery capabilities.
